special_text:
Fable [i](You may trigger the chapters of this saga in any order. You choose which chapter to use as you place lore counters on it.)[/i]
I – Create a colorless 1/1 Spirit enchantment creature token.
II – Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature you control.
III – Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
